issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Lineage: Minor CPU/Mem optimization for lineage transform

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Logical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are independent of runtime.

fields.description:
In a fairly large query which had tens of left join, time taken to create linageInfo itself took 1500+ seconds. This is due to the fact that the table had lots of columns and in some processing, it ended up processing 7000+ value columns in {{ReduceSinkLineage}}, though only 50 columns were projected in the query. 

It would be good to invoke lineage transform when rest of the optimizers in {{Optimizer}} are invoked. This would avoid unwanted processing and help in improving the runtime.
fields.summary: Optimizer: Lineage transform() should be invoked after rest of the optimizers are invoked
